    • 方法详细资料

      • copy

        public static int copy​(java.io.InputStream in,
                       java.io.OutputStream out)
                throws java.io.IOException
        the utility api of copying all data in "inputstream" to "outputstream". please refers copy(in, out, boolean)
        参数:
        in - the inputstream
        out - the outputstream
        返回:
        int the size of copied
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • delete

        public static int delete​(java.io.File f)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • delete

        public static int delete​(java.io.File f,
                         long age)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        delete the file or the path.
        参数:
        f - the file or the path
        返回:
        the number deleted
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - throw exception when delete the file or directory error

      • copyDir

        public static int copyDir​(java.io.File src,
                          java.io.File dest)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        copy files.
        参数:
        src - the source file
        dest - the destination file
        返回:
        the number copied
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - throw exception when copy failed

      • copyDir

        public static int copyDir​(java.io.File src,
                          java.io.File dest,
                          java.lang.String[] except)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        copy all the files except.
        参数:
        src - the source dir
        dest - the destination dir
        except - the files
        返回:
        the number files copied
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - throw IOException if error

      • copy

        public static int copy​(java.io.File src,
                       java.io.File dest)
                throws java.io.IOException
        copy file src to file destination.
        参数:
        src - the source file
        dest - the destination file
        返回:
        int of copied
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - throw exception when copy file failed

      • copy

        public static int copy​(DFile src,
                       DFile dest)
                throws java.io.IOException
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • copy

        public static int copy​(java.io.InputStream in,
                       java.io.OutputStream out,
                       long start,
                       long end,
                       boolean closeAfterDone)
                throws java.io.IOException
        copy the data in "inputstream" to "outputstream", from start to end.
        参数:
        in - the inputstream
        out - the outputstream
        start - the start position of started
        end - the end position of ended
        closeAfterDone - close after done, true: close if done, false: not close
        返回:
        int the size of copied
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • copy

        public static int copy​(java.io.InputStream in,
                       java.io.OutputStream out,
                       boolean closeAfterDone)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Copy data in "inputstream" to "outputstream".
        参数:
        in - the inputstream
        out - the outputstream
        closeAfterDone - close after done, true: close if done, false: not close
        返回:
        int the size of copied
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
